oai_dc:dc.dc:title: WAVE HEIGHT DISTRIBUTION AROUND PERMEABLE BREAKWATERS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hotta, Shintaro
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: height distribution
breakwater
permeable breakwater
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: By superimposing solutions due to Sommerfeld, a calculation was made to obtain the wave height distribution around permeable breakwaters in a constant water depth. The cases dealt with were a semi-infinite breakwater, a single relatively large gap in a long breakwater and a single detached breakwater all with incident waves normal to the breakwater. Some cases were verified through experiments in a shallow water basin.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 16 (1978): Proceedings of 16th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Hamburg, Germany, 1978.; 39
